Hereford 1-1 Doncaster

Hereford win 3-1 on penalties.

Rovers took the lead on 59 minutes as <name>Michael McIndoe</name>'s corner found <name>Adriano Rigoglioso</name>, whose stunning volley soared into the top right of the net. <name>Danny Williams</name> equalised for the hosts after 72 minutes with a crisp finish from just insist the penalty box. <lname>McIndoe</lname> saw an extra-time penalty saved, giving <lname>Mills</lname> the chance to net the winning penalty.
